verses.roman:
prabhu tāṅre cāpaḍa māri' kahite lāgilā
prabhu dekhi' daṇḍavat prāṅgaṇe padilā

synonyms: prabhu dekhi'-after seeing the Lord there; daṇḍavat—obeisances; prāṅgaṇe—in the courtyard; paḍilā—fell down; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅre—to Rūpa Gosvāmī; cāpaḍa māri'-giving a mild slap; kahite lāgilā—began to speak.
translation: Seeing the Lord, Śrī Rūpa Gosvāmī fell flat in the courtyard to offer obeisances. The Lord slapped him mildly in love and spoke as follows.
